headline.main: METAXAS FUNERAL A DISPLAY OF UNITY; 'You Have Opened the Road to Victory,' Says New Premier in Address at Bier

lead_paragraph: ATHENS, Jan. 31 -- Premier General John Metaxas was buried today after a solemn ceremony in the Athens Cathedral, seat of national Greek Orthodoxy, and thousands upon thousands of people stood hatless and silent watching the austere military parade that conducted the dead Premier to his grave.
abstract: Premier Metaxas funeral; Premier Korizis and Sec Hull note loss to nation

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
